margin--b-none.title: No bottom margin
margin--b-none.description: Removes all margin from the bottom.

margin--b-xs.title: Tiny bottom margin
margin--b-xs.description: Adds a tiny amount of margin to the bottom.

margin--b-sm.title: Small bottom margin
margin--b-sm.description: Adds a small amount of margin to the bottom.

margin--b-md.title: Medium bottom margin
margin--b-md.description: Adds a medium amount of margin to the bottom.

margin--b-lg.title: Large bottom margin
margin--b-lg.description: Adds a large amount of margin to the bottom.

margin--b-xl.title: Extra-large bottom margin
margin--b-xl.description: Adds an extra-large amount of margin to the bottom.

margin--b-xxl.title: Double-extra-large bottom margin
margin--b-xxl.description: Adds a double-extra-large amount of margin to the bottom.
